pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Additive Models for Location Scale and Shape (and Beyond) // Infrastructure for estimating probabilistic distributional regression models in a Bayesian framework. The distribution parameters may capture location, scale, shape, etc. and every parameter may depend on complex additive terms (fixed, random, smooth, spatial, etc.) similar to a generalized additive model. The conceptual and computational framework is introduced in Umlauf, Klein, Zeileis (2017) doi:10.1080/10618600.2017.1407325.
